name: HAR_ALL
description: Generic table that contains every hospital account record regardless of its type. It also contains the patient record that is associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the patient associated with this hospital account.

columns.name: PRIM_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact.
